references.paper_title: ISP: Multi-Layered Garment Draping with Implicit Sewing Patterns
references.reason: This paper introduces the Implicit Sewing Patterns (ISP) model, which is the core methodology of the current paper for garment modeling and provides a differentiable representation for garment geometry.
This paper provides the VR-Folding dataset which is used for validating the proposed method and serves as a primary benchmark for comparison.

references.paper_title: Diffusion Shape Prior for Wrinkle-Accurate Cloth Registration
references.reason: This paper introduces a diffusion-based shape prior for cloth registration, which is closely related to the current paper's use of diffusion models for deformation priors.

references.paper_title: Dense Image Registration and Deformable Surface Reconstruction in Presence of Occlusions and Minimal Texture
references.reason: This paper provides background on non-rigid 3D reconstruction techniques, which are relevant to the challenges addressed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Monocular Template-Based Reconstruction of Inextensible Surfaces
references.reason: This paper discusses monocular template-based reconstruction methods for inextensible surfaces which are relevant to the garment reconstruction problem.
